Legends and Gods

A

Ardere

Ardere, is a Greater Phoenix who was summoned to this mortal plane by a village that no longer exists

Stat Block

L13 Greater Phoenix, fly long range, HP 53, damage 16, immune to fire damage, , Shroud of Fire 5 fire damage on touch, death throws (on death all those within a short distance take 20 fire damage and ignites all flammable objects not worn or carried), rebirth (upon death after 1d6 days rises from its ashes)

B

Bryta

Bryta is Saleh Araleth raven friend who protects his vial

Stat Block

L6 Giant Raven, HP 16, damage 9, L7 Perception

N

Mistress Nocturna

A bewitching and enchanting ruler, Mistress Nocturna is a seductress of shadows. She governs the realm with an intoxicating allure, drawing unsuspecting souls into the depths of the Umbra Plane to be ensnared in its dark embrace.

V

Virakh Yordan

Virakh Yordan was the founder of [The Vanguard].

Stat Block

L7 HP 29, damage 8, L8 Theiving Skills, L9 Intimidation
